solution:
```python
N, M = map(int, input().split())
A = list(map(int, input().split()))
B = []
for _ in range(N):
    B.append(list(map(int, input().split())))

dist = [0] * N
for i in range(1, N):
    dist[i] = dist[i - 1] + A[i - 1]

max_happiness = -float('inf')
for i in range(N):
    for j in range(1 << M):
        current_happiness = 0
        current_pos = i
        used_tickets = [False] * M
        current_distance = 0
        
        for k in range(M):
            if (j >> k) & 1:
                current_happiness += B[current_pos][k]
                used_tickets[k] = True

        
        for k in range(M):
          if not used_tickets[k]:
            next_restaurant = -1
            max_add = -1
            for rest in range(N):
              add = B[rest][k] - (dist[rest] - dist[current_pos] if rest > current_pos else dist[current_pos] - dist[rest])
              if add > max_add:
                max_add = add
                next_restaurant = rest
            
            if next_restaurant != -1:
              current_happiness += B[next_restaurant][k]
              current_distance += abs(dist[next_restaurant] - dist[current_pos])
              current_pos = next_restaurant
              used_tickets[k] = True

        max_happiness = max(max_happiness, current_happiness - current_distance)

print(max_happiness)
```
